Articles.Content:
This mod is no longer under active development. Do not download this mod.

If you wish to download the component bodies, visit the original mod:

The new bodies previously part of this mod (Doppler, Palloocus, etc.) are now part of their own planet pack.

 

Edited November 19, 2021 by Interplanet Janet
Neat!

3 hours ago, Interplanet Janet said:
  1. Mod compatibility
    1. DMagic Orbital Science

Ithink it kinda works with DMagic orbital science? I have -on Exo's version- a probe around Ervo loaded with al kinds experiments, stock and DM, and I think they all work. Will have to doublecheck that.

4 hours ago, modus said:

Ithink it kinda works with DMagic orbital science? I have -on Exo's version- a probe around Ervo loaded with al kinds experiments, stock and DM, and I think they all work. Will have to doublecheck that.

AFAIK, she never actually wrote any patches for DMagic Orbital Science. I will try to make sure all the science experiments are taken care of with DMagic, although there are a ton of them.

So I just checked really quickly. I am in low orbit around Ervo, and I can get low orbit science from DMagic's experiments, like the telescope, magnetometer, micro goo, radio and plasma wave, ...

Weird. 

haven't really checked biomespecific science though...

Edited September 16, 2021 by modus

5 hours ago, modus said:

So I just checked really quickly. I am in low orbit around Ervo, and I can get low orbit science from DMagic's experiments, like the telescope, magnetometer, micro goo, radio and plasma wave, ...

Weird. 

haven't really checked biomespecific science though...

Admittedly, yes, it does have science definitions, but most of the time it resorts to a couple of defaults. I think I will need to try to write some custom science definitions. Those will likely come in version 1.2, hopefully.

Yeah it all looks kinda generic

Great work, looking forward to more!

Love it! Glad this mod found a new home

Is there a GitHub (or equivalent) link you can include in the OP? Makes things like bug reporting a lot easier. 

Edited September 16, 2021 by AtomicRocketBooster

I don't have Github yet, but I should make one. Thanks.

EDIT: Added!

Edited September 16, 2021 by Interplanet Janet
Good to see this mod getting a new lease on life.

@Interplanet Janethey! So, you have adopted MPE... It brings me back to the time I was going to make a movie out of it, but I didn't continue it.
Best of luck on the improvements of this mod! I might revive Beyond Eeloo's vibe by... a book... Soon.

 

And make Havous great!

4 hours ago, Kerbal Productions said:

@Interplanet Janethey! So, you have adopted MPE... It brings me back to the time I was going to make a movie out of it, but I didn't continue it.
Best of luck on the improvements of this mod! I might revive Beyond Eeloo's vibe by... a book... Soon.

 

And make Havous great!

How can I make it greater? It's already great as it is!

2 hours ago, Interplanet Janet said:

It's already great as it is! 

Very true!

 

More to come soon!
Do you need anything else other then Kopernicus for this mod to work?
Nope!

4 minutes ago, modus said:

Nope!

Great!

@Interplanet Janethello again, I just have a suggestion for the future versions of this magnificent mod.

1. Textures: hopefully some will be a bit more clearer (not like Parallax, that might just be impossible )
2. Interesting science definitions: I just see some mods with a plain message on the science transmission. I don't like that. I like to give myself some fun... with science! And support with other mods (I know that already since I read forums) is magnificent!
3. Moaaaaaar stuff: I mean, Havous is my favorite, Soden is already featured in my video (check it out on my channel), Ervo (is this w/ the atmosphere) is used and seen multiple times in my A Golden Decade video. Make stuff more interesting, if possible. And yes, I know you'll add some more, and I'm stoked. Hopefully I just might make a video with that soon

 

Best of luck with maintaining this mod!
 

Spoiler

By the way, you are nominated for Kerbal Grammys oh, wrong thing. TOTM for October 2021!

22 minutes ago, Kerbal Productions said:

@Interplanet Janethello again, I just have a suggestion for the future versions of this magnificent mod.

1. Textures: hopefully some will be a bit more clearer (not like Parallax, that might just be impossible )
2. Interesting science definitions: I just see some mods with a plain message on the science transmission. I don't like that. I like to give myself some fun... with science! And support with other mods (I know that already since I read forums) is magnificent!
3. Moaaaaaar stuff: I mean, Havous is my favorite, Soden is already featured in my video (check it out on my channel), Ervo (is this w/ the atmosphere) is used and seen multiple times in my A Golden Decade video. Make stuff more interesting, if possible. And yes, I know you'll add some more, and I'm stoked. Hopefully I just might make a video with that soon

 

Best of luck with maintaining this mod!
 

  Hide contents

By the way, you are nominated for Kerbal Grammys oh, wrong thing. TOTM for October 2021!

 

You nominate by reporting right?

3 hours ago, Kerbal Productions said:

@Interplanet Janethello again, I just have a suggestion for the future versions of this magnificent mod.

1. Textures: hopefully some will be a bit more clearer (not like Parallax, that might just be impossible )
2. Interesting science definitions: I just see some mods with a plain message on the science transmission. I don't like that. I like to give myself some fun... with science! And support with other mods (I know that already since I read forums) is magnificent!
3. Moaaaaaar stuff: I mean, Havous is my favorite, Soden is already featured in my video (check it out on my channel), Ervo (is this w/ the atmosphere) is used and seen multiple times in my A Golden Decade video. Make stuff more interesting, if possible. And yes, I know you'll add some more, and I'm stoked. Hopefully I just might make a video with that soon
 

Ah, don't worry. I'm sure Exo might be developing a remake in the near future. I'm already working on DDS and OnDemand loading, so that should be cool.

3 hours ago, Kerbal Productions said:
  Reveal hidden contents

By the way, you are nominated for Kerbal Grammys oh, wrong thing. TOTM for October 2021!

 

Spoiler

The heck is TOTM?

1 hour ago, Interplanet Janet said:

TOTM?

Thread of the month. You'll get honored! More info given by some people... haha, I'm lazy rn to give a link!

4 hours ago, Minmus Taster said:

You nominate by reporting right?

Report it and say some stuff like "good morning my friend I had a cup of coffee and also I landed on the mun but after i crashed then I aerobraked on Jool but I forgot the heat shield so it's a death and I got to go to Eeloo and hug it"

 

Just kiddin'

say that you nominate it!

Version 1.1.2 is out, featuring"

  • OnDemand textures,
  • Smaller config size,
  • Modified TimeWarpAltitudeLimits, and
  • Minor description grammar fixes.
